Firestrike laughed as Perceptors nails bit through the metal.  
"Bring it on..."  he grabbed the pistol and aimed it where the claws 
were coming through.  "Perceptor, when you make it through this 
wall, I tell you now to bend down to the ground, kneel and pray to 
Switchblade himself to save you for I will blast you to infinty if you 
don't!"
